setup_script_description: sets focus on the third radio button
task: navigate out of end of radio group
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate out of the radio group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Right Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the group.
output_assertions: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name 'Navigate backwards from here' is conveyed
